roleset.name: mark with freckles

example.name: artistic with arg 0
example.text: The sun freckled the ground with dots of light through the trees
example.arg: with dots of light through the trees

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Her substantial freckling was cause by sun exposure.

roleset.note: FRECKLE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison with freckling-n but with a possible arg 0. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from freckle.01-v)
FRECKLING-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from freckling.01-n)
